segment.source: How to use the Platform Selection page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to pick the specs for your employee devices that will get the install package.
segment.target: How to use the Platform Selection page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to pick the specs for your employee devices that will get the install package.

segment.source: Use the Platform Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Platform Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Platform Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Platform Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The Platform Selection page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you pick the operating system and architecture (32-bit or 64-bit) for the devices on which you’re going to install the custom installation package.
segment.target: The Platform Selection page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you pick the operating system and architecture (32-bit or 64-bit) for the devices on which you’re going to install the custom installation package.

segment.source: To use the Platform Selection page
segment.target: To use the Platform Selection page

segment.source: Pick the operating system and architecture for the devices on which you’re going to install the custom package.
segment.target: Pick the operating system and architecture for the devices on which you’re going to install the custom package.

segment.source: You must create individual packages for each supported operating system.
segment.target: You must create individual packages for each supported operating system.

segment.source: To keep your settings across several operating system packages, you can specify the same destination folder.
segment.target: To keep your settings across several operating system packages, you can specify the same destination folder.

segment.source: Then, after running the wizard, you can reuse the resulting .ins file.
segment.target: Then, after running the wizard, you can reuse the resulting .ins file.

segment.source: Any additional changes to the .ins file are saved.
segment.target: Any additional changes to the .ins file are saved.

segment.source: For more info about using .ins files, see Using Internet Settings (.INS) files with IEAK 11.
segment.target: For more info about using .ins files, see Using Internet Settings (.INS) files with IEAK 11.

segment.source: For more info about adding in your .ins file, see Use the File Locations page in the IEAK 11 Wizard.
segment.target: For more info about adding in your .ins file, see Use the File Locations page in the IEAK 11 Wizard.

segment.source: Click Next to go to the Language Selection page or Back to go to the File Locations page.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the Language Selection page or Back to go to the File Locations page.
